wikitext.*:
'''Carnimírië''' was one of the [[rowans]] of [[Fangorn Forest]], much beloved by the [[Ent]] [[Quickbeam|Bregalad]]. It was cut down by [[Orcs]] of [[Isengard]], arousing the anger of this impulsive Ent.<ref>{{TT|III4}}, pp. 483-484</ref>

==Etymology==
In a letter, [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] explained that ''carnemírië'' means "with adornment of red jewels" in High-elven ([[Quenya]]).<ref>{{L|168}}, p. 224</ref> In another manuscript he explained the name as the abstract form of ''carni-mírea'' ("red-jeweled").<ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 83. Cf. also {{S|Appendix}}, entry ''[[caran]]''</ref>
